elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Please answer the following questions on the subject of gift sales (multiple answers possible).

elements.name: Welche Eigenschaften sollten Sie besitzen, damit der Geschenkverkauf gelingt?
choices: Product range knowledge and operational knowledge
Aggressive sales technique and marketing strategy
Empathy and knowledge of the legal basis
correctAnswer: Product range knowledge and operational knowledge
Empathy and knowledge of the legal basis

elements.name: In welcher Hinsicht stellt der Geschenkverkauf für Sie eine Chance dar?
choices: It offers the opportunity to get rid of slow sellers.
With your expert advice, you can trigger positive emotions and strengthen customer loyalty.
correctAnswer: With your expert advice, you can trigger positive emotions and strengthen customer loyalty.

elements.name: Welche Regeln sollten Sie einhalten, wenn die beschenkte Person unbekannt oder schlecht bekannt ist?
choices: The gift must be as original as possible.
The recommended product must not require the use of other products.
Only high-priced products should be offered.
correctAnswer: The recommended product must not require the use of other products.

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Answer the following questions on the subject of gift sales.

elements.name: Welche Motive für einen Geschenkkauf kennen Sie? Nennen Sie mindestens fünf Anlässe.
elements.correctAnswer: Personal celebrations/occasions (birthday, baptism, confirmation, confirmation, wedding, wedding anniversary, family celebration, invitation, funeral, memorial service, hospitalization); new stages in life (passing an exam, moving into a new apartment, buying a house, job promotion, retirement); holidays (Christmas, Easter, Eid, Diwali, Mother's Day, Father's Day); thanks for services rendered (lending things, babysitting, looking after the house and pets, helping with household chores, repairs, etc.).)

elements.name: Welche Kundendienste und Serviceleistungen sind im Zusammenhang mit dem Geschenkkauf von Bedeutung?
elements.correctAnswer: Customer services: exchange, right of return; services: Home delivery, personalization options (e.g. engraving, enclosed greeting card)

elements.name: Welche Handlungen führen Sie beim Abschluss des Geschenkverkaufs aus?
elements.correctAnswer: Remove price labels; offer gift packaging; advise customers to keep the original receipt; if possible, print out an additional receipt without price information
